00016 // .NAME vtkCellsFilter- abstract superclass for removing/selecting cells.
00017 // .SECTION Description
00018 // vtkCellsFilter is an abstract superclass for classes the remove or select cells.r
00019 
00020 
00021 // .SECTION Thanks
00022 // Goodwin Lawlor, University College Dublin
00023 
00024 
00025 #ifndef __vtkCellsFilter_h
00026 #define __vtkCellsFilter_h
00027 
00028 #include "vtkPolyDataAlgorithm.h"
00029 #include "vtkIdList.h"
00030 #include "vtkCharArray.h"
00031 #include "vtkPolyData.h"
00032 #include "vtkBioengConfigure.h" // Include configuration header.
00033 
00034 class vtkLookupTable;
00035 
00036 class VTK_BIOENG_EXPORT vtkCellsFilter : public vtkPolyDataAlgorithm
00037 {
00038 public:
00039 
00040   vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkCellsFilter, vtkPolyDataAlgorithm);
00041   void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00042   
00043   // Description:
00044   // Remove a cell from the input polydata.  cellid is a cell id from the input to the filter
00045   // A recursive trick remaps the new cellids (from the output) to the old cellids (at the input) 
00046   // so that the cellid returned by vtkCellPicker is the correct one to use.
00047  //void RemoveCell(vtkIdType cellid);
00048  
00049    // Description:
00050   // Mark a cell to be removed by RemoveMarkedCells later.  
00051  void MarkCell(vtkIdType cellid);
00052  
00053    // Description:
00054   // Unmark any cell that has been marked already
00055  void UnmarkCell(vtkIdType cellid);
00056  
00057    // Description:
00058   // If a cells is unmarked- mark it... if its marked- unmark it.
00059  void ToggleCell(vtkIdType cellid);
00060  
00061   // Description:
00062   // Remove the cells marked by MarkCell(cellid)
00063  //void RemoveMarkedCells();
00064  
00065   // Description:
00066   // Remove everything but the cells marked by MarkCell(cellid) or ToggleCells(cellid)
00067   //void RemoveUnmarkedCells();
00068  
00069  // Description:
00070  // Undo all the remove operations 
00071  //void UndoRemoveCells(){this->Initialize(); this->Modified();}
00072  
00073  // Description:
00074  // Undo all the marks made on cells
00075  void UndoMarks(){this->InitializeScalars(); this->MarkedCellIdList->Reset(); this->Scalars->Modified();}
00076 
00077  //int GetNumberOfDeletedCells(){return this->GetInput()->GetNumberOfCells() - this->GetOutput()->GetNumberOfCells();}
00078  
00079   // Description:
00080   // Set/Get the marked color... default is red
00081   void SetMarkedColor(double r, double g, double b);
00082   void SetMarkedColor(double rgb[3]) {this->SetMarkedColor(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2]);};
00083   vtkGetVector3Macro(MarkedColor, double);
00084 
00085 
00086   // Description:
00087   // Set/Get the umarked color... default is white. You could set this to the same color as the vtkProperty
00088   // and users won't know they are seeing scalars.
00089   void SetUnmarkedColor(double r, double g, double b);
00090   void SetUnmarkedColor(double rgb[3]) {this->SetUnmarkedColor(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2]);};
00091   vtkGetVector3Macro(UnmarkedColor, double);
00092 
00093   
00094   // Description:
00095   // Set/Get the marked opacity... default is 1.0 By setting this to 0.0 you can temporally remove the cells
00096   // and then permanently remove them with RemoveMarkedCells
00097   void SetMarkedOpacity(double opacity);
00098   vtkGetMacro(MarkedOpacity, double);
00099 
00100 
00101 protected:
00102   vtkCellsFilter();
00103   ~vtkCellsFilter();
00104   
00105   vtkIdList *CellIdList;
00106   vtkIdList *MarkedCellIdList;
00107   
00108   int IsInitialized;
00109   int IsScalarsInitialized;
00110   
00111   vtkCharArray *Scalars;
00112   vtkLookupTable *LUT;
00113  
00114   void Initialize();
00115   void InitializeScalars();
00116   
00117   double MarkedColor[3];
00118   double UnmarkedColor[3];
00119   double MarkedOpacity;
00120   
00121   // Usual data generation method
00122   virtual int RequestData(vtkInformation *, vtkInformationVector **, vtkInformationVector *);
00123 
00124 private:
00125   vtkCellsFilter(const vtkCellsFilter&);  // Not implemented.
00126   void operator=(const vtkCellsFilter&);  // Not implemented.
00127 };
00128 
00129 #endif
